events.message: I ordered a pair of shoes last week, but they don't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund since I cannot use them.
Tagging the case under refund category based on customer's request for money back on ill-fitting shoes.
Assigning the case to customer support agent Jane Smith for handling the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the shoes didn’t fit properly. I’m here to help you with the refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes have been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 987654321. The shoes are brand new, only tried on indoors, no damage at all.
Thanks for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the shoes back using the free return label we will email you shortly.
Great, that sounds good. I appreciate the free return shipping and quick help with this refund.
We have issued the refund once the returned shoes are received and inspected. You will get a confirmation email soon.
Just following up to confirm that you received the refund. Please contact us if you have any further issues or questions.
Since no further responses were received and refund was successful, we are closing this support case now. Thank you!
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to help us improve our refund services. Your feedback is appreciated.
